title: Miss Lonely and the Detective Boys

infobox.Title:: Miss Lonely and the Detective Boys
infobox.Japanese title:: 未亡人と探偵団  (Mizu Ronrii to Tantei-dan)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Hiroshi Agasa  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi
infobox.Animation director:: Masatomo Sudo, Seiji Muta, and Nobuyuki Iwai (supervisors)  Michitaka Yamamoto  Kaoru Nagakawa
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Kyoko Yoshimi (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Daiki Nakamura as Kohei Kajiki  Aya Yamane as Receptionist  Hoko Kuwashima as Tomoko Komori

sections.Situation:
The detective boys become friends of a widow, when she was dating with a man, the man dies.

Conan notices a few weird clues and believes it to not be a mere accident.
sections.People:
- 35 years old
- Housewife
- Widow
- Victim (fell)
- 45 years old
- Men's cosmetics company president
- Floral park receptionist
- Lady in a tree
- Deceased
- Tomoko's previous husband
sections.Resolution:
- Deceased
- Tomoko's first husband
- Deceased
- Tomoko's second husband
- Deceased
- Tomoko's third husband
- Deceased
- Tomoko's fourth husband
sections.Trivia:
- Komori drinks a Sassicaia red wine produced by Tenuta San Guido.
- The flower park the kids visit is in Sasago-cho, a district that appeared in The Job Request from Inspector Megure.
